champ_0150_rival_01:
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]! [VAR PKNAME(0001)]!\c
You did it! Aaah, I’m so happy for you! This is
the best![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0150_rival_02:
I know I said I wasn’t worried, but my heart was
still pounding the whole time![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0150_chairman_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Most impressive, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]. A
shining\r
display\r
of\r
talent,\r
I must\r
admit.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0150_rival_07:
Seriously. Pat yourself on the back—you beat
every single Gym![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0150_chairman_03: Now that you’ve gathered eight Gym Badges...[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0150_chairman_04: all that’s left is to take on the Pokémon League![VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0150_chairman_05:
If you hope to stand alongside Nemona as a
fellow Champion...[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0150_chairman_06:
head to the Pokémon League. That is where you
can take on the Champion Assessment.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0150_rival_04:
Yeah—hurry up and get to my rank! I’m itching
for a battle of equals![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0150_rival_05:
I’ve gotta take the time while you’re facing the
Pokémon League to fine-tune my Pokémon’s\r
moves and revamp all my tactics![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0150_rival_06:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Well, good luck, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]! And
wish\r
me\r
luck, too![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0150_chairman_07:
It’s unusual for me to see her so excited—
though perhaps not for you.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0150_chairman_08:
She must really be happy that she finally has a
friend who can keep pace with her own talents.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0150_chairman_09:
There’s a special kind of strength that can only
be reached by competing with a good rival...[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0150_chairman_10:
Count me among those eager to see how far
you two can go![VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0150_chairman_11:
In any case, I’ll be waiting for you at the
Pokémon League, northwest of Mesagoza.[VAR 0114(0011)]
